abstract: Pete Wells, the editor of the Dining In/Dining Out section, is answering questions July 23-27.
snippet: Pete Wells, the editor of the Dining In/Dining Out section, is answering questions July 23-27.
lead_paragraph: Pete Wells, The Times's dining editor, answered questions from readers July 23-27, 2007.

headline.main:
